page.title: 11STOTTESDON SOCIAL GROUPS
page.content: {Women's Institute}has about 30 members. Meets monthly in the school. Approx 30% of members live in the block.Interesting selection of speakers. Visitors always welcome at any meeting or other event. Proceeds of whist drive for Cancer Research. {Church/P.C.C.}normally has 3 fund raising events a year, well attended by people from all over the parish (which extends far beyond the block), & by people from other parishes served by the same Vicar. {School}Parent-teacher club involves many other community members in at least one event a year. Proceeds go towards school events or equipment. {Social Activities Committee}(formally the Jubillee Committee) was originally started to organise celebrations in Jubilee Year<1977>, & has continued to arrange various village social events.
